mapper.update:
update T_NB_GDCZ
ND = #{nd,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GD = #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RJCZE = #{rjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RJCZDQSJ = #{rjczdqsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RJCZFS = #{rjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJCZE = #{sjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SJCZSJ = #{sjczsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SJCZFS = #{sjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_NB_GDCZ set ND = #{nd,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GD = #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJCZE = #{rjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RJCZDQSJ = #{rjczdqsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RJCZFS = #{rjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJCZE = #{sjcze,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SJCZSJ = #{sjczsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SJCZFS = #{sjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into T_NB_BD_GDCZ (ID, ND, XYDM, GD, RJCZE, RJCZDQSJ, RJCZFS, SJCZE, SJCZSJ, SJCZFS, SJLY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rjcze,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rjczdqsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjcze,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sjczsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sjczfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 2)
mapper.select:
select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_GDCZ where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId})

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_BD_GDCZ where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId}) AND SJLY = 1

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_BD_GDCZ where (xydm,nd) in(select a.hcdw_xydm,b.nd from t_hcrw a,t_hcrw_nd b where a.id=b.hcrw_id and a.id=#{hcrwId}) AND SJLY = 2
